Source: Pixabay

The two images show an agricultural transition that occurred in the twentieth century. Which of the following best explains how this transition helped meet a challenge of contemporary agriculture?

choices.label: The decreased use of pesticides and herbicides reduced the pollution of land and waterways.
The increased crop yield produced more food for a growing global urban and industrial population.
The reliance on genetically modified crops, which only wealthier farmers could afford, decreased.
The increased use of machinery preserved traditional farming methods and cultures.
The increased use of machinery prevented women from reaching opportunities for advancement.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Compare patterns and trends in sources to draw conclusions.
